Miscarriage support groups call for fast-track of setting care standardshttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/miscarriage-support-groups-call-for-fast-track-of-setting-care-standards/SMW4INVKUJABPATMRWDEBX67EE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/miscarriage-support-groups-call-for-fast-track-of-setting-care-standards/SMW4INVKUJABPATMRWDEBX67EE/ More lives are lost to miscarriages under 20 weeks than deaths on the roads. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 08:03:09 +0000 The Perinatal Bereavement Support Environmental Scan report found services were patchy across the country.
